short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your content to Collate and receive bite sized newsletters from it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Collate Newsletter chrome extension, the effortless way to transform online content into your personalized newsletters.

Collate is your innovative platform for easy learning, allowing you to convert any online content into bite-sized newsletters.

We've developed the Collate Newsletter browser extension to let you effortlessly save any webpage directly into Collate. Simply capture articles, research, and inspirations, and we'll help you compile them into a concise and informative newsletter.

CAPTURE WITH ONE CLICK.
Whenever you come across interesting content, just hit the Collate button on the top right of your browser!

Dive into an efficient learning experience with Collate.
